translation.zh: 而在此期间 不如我们聊些别的？

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 靠

translation.en: Fuck! Goddamn it!
translation.zh: 我操！他妈的！

translation.en: [screams] Fuck! Fuck! Fuck!
translation.zh: 操！ 操！

translation.en: [Jason Kennedy] That infamous incident from five years ago
translation.zh: 五年前那起臭名昭著的事件

translation.en: signaled the end of Candy Black's stellar career.
translation.zh: 终结了坎蒂布莱克辉煌的演艺生涯

translation.en: And today, Hollywood's class clown has fallen to a new low.
translation.zh:
而今天 这位好莱坞小丑
跌入了人生新低谷

translation.en: Yeah, Ms. Black has been on trial
translation.zh: 是的 布莱克小姐

translation.en: for six counts of willfully failing to file federal income tax returns
translation.zh:
因六项故意未提交
联邦所得税申报表的指控而受审

translation.en: for amounts totaling $6.3 million.
translation.zh: 应纳税总额达630万美元

translation.en: It's been a stunning fall from grace for one
translation.zh: 这位深受观众喜爱

translation.en: of the most successful female comedy stars of all time.
translation.zh: 有史以来最成功的女喜剧明星之一

translation.en: Of course, beloved by audiences…
translation.zh: 一夜之间从巅峰跌入谷底

translation.en: [Giuliana Rancic] Candy's career took a nosedive after her on-set meltdown.
translation.zh:
坎蒂在片场失控崩溃之后
事业便急转而下

translation.en: [Jason] She's become one of Hollywood's most famous recluses,
translation.zh: 她现已成为好莱坞最著名的隐士之一

translation.en: hiding out in her Long Island estate, rivaling Howard Hughes and Greta Garbo
translation.zh: 藏身在她的长岛别墅中 她不愿再度回到聚光灯下

translation.en: for her reluctance to step back into the limelight.
translation.zh: 就跟霍华德休斯和格雷塔嘉宝一样

translation.en: Candy Black did not appear in court today,
translation.zh: 坎蒂布莱克今天并未出庭

translation.en: and in fact, she has not been seen in public at all for the last five years.
translation.zh:
实际上 在过去的五年里
她从未在公开场合露面

translation.en: [Jason] Her attorneys claimed she was too drunk to file her taxes,
translation.zh: 她的律师声称她喝得太醉 没法报税

translation.en: so a judge has sentenced her to 90 days in rehab.
translation.zh:
因此法官判她进入戒瘾中心
接受为期90天的戒酒治疗

translation.en: Coming up next, we have a top mixologist
translation.zh: 稍后 一位顶级调酒师将教我们制作

translation.en: to show us Candy's shockingly powerful highball whiskey cocktail--
translation.zh: 稍后 一位顶级调酒师将教我们制作 坎蒂威力强大的威士忌高球鸡尾酒

translation.en: [Steve] Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Whatcha up to?
translation.zh: 你在干嘛？

translation.en: [Candy] Watching dumb online news.
translation.zh: 看愚蠢的网络新闻

translation.en: That stuff's toxic. It's all noise.
translation.zh: 那东西有害无益 全都是噪音

translation.en: Yeah, I know. You're right.
translation.zh: 我知道 你说得对

translation.en: Getting rid of my TV was the best decision I ever made.
translation.zh: 把电视扔掉是我做过最明智的决定

translation.en: I never watched it, anyway.
translation.zh: 反正我也从来不看电视

translation.en: And I banned myself from going online till I finish the first draft of my book.
translation.zh:
我还禁止自己上网了
直到完成了书的初稿为止

translation.en: How's the new table coming along?
translation.zh: 你的新桌子弄得怎么样了？

translation.en: -You use pine? -[Candy] Fuck pine.
translation.zh:
-你用松木吗？
-去他妈的松木

translation.en: I chose cedar, obviously.
translation.zh: 当然是选了雪松木

translation.en: -Did you use a rasp on the legs? -No.
translation.zh: 桌腿是用木锉修边吗？ 不是

translation.en: [chuckles] A riffler and some spoon blades.
translation.zh: 用波纹锉和匙型刀

translation.en: [deep sigh] I wish I was with you right now.
translation.zh: 真希望我现在就在你身边

translation.en: We could see just how sturdy that table really is.
translation.zh:
那我们就能测试看
你那桌子到底有多稳固

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 是啊

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Look, there's something… I need to talk to you about.
translation.zh: 听着 我有件事要跟你说

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Things are just… They're pretty crazy right now, and…
translation.zh: 事情现在简直是一团糟

translation.en: I might not be able to…
translation.zh: 我可能无法…

translation.en: I don't think I'm…
translation.zh: 我想…

translation.en: gonna be able to talk to you for a couple months.
translation.zh:
我在接下来的几个月里
是无法和你通话了

translation.en: I-- A couple of months?
translation.zh: 几个月？

translation.en: Two or three, at the most.
translation.zh: 最多两或三个月

translation.en: Wait, why? Where are you going? Why can't we talk on the phone?
translation.zh:
为啥？你要去哪？
为啥连通电话都不行？

translation.en: I can't tell you,
translation.zh: 我不能告诉你

translation.en: but, um, after this hiatus,
translation.zh: 但等我这次暂别后归来

translation.en: I just want to pick up right where we left off, and…
translation.zh: 我希望我们能重拾旧日情 还有…

translation.en: I just need you to know
translation.zh: 我只是想让你知道

translation.en: how important this relationship is to me.
translation.zh: 这段关系对我而言是多么重要

translation.en: What relationship? We've never even met.
translation.zh: 什么关系？我们连面都没见过

translation.en: Now you're telling me you have to go away and there's nothing you can do about it?
translation.zh:
现在你告诉我你必须离开
而且还对此无能为力？

translation.en: Look, I think that--
translation.zh: 听我说 我觉得…

translation.en: Okay, I don't know why you're doing this.
translation.zh: 我不明白你为什么要这么做

translation.en: I felt like we were finally getting somewhere, but…
translation.zh: 我觉得我们之间终于有了进展 但…

translation.en: [sighs] Whatever. Anyway, I gotta go.
translation.zh: 算了吧 好了 我得挂了

translation.en: Hey, can't sleep in your car around here.
translation.zh: 嘿 这里不允许在车里过夜

translation.en: No, of course not. I…
translation.zh: 不 当然不

translation.en: I wasn't sleeping in my car, I…
translation.zh: 我没在车里过夜

translation.en: I just pulled over for a little power nap, that's all.
translation.zh: 我只是停下来打个盹儿而已

translation.en: [policeman] Sure, lady.
translation.zh: 随便吧 女士

translation.en: Gotta move your car. Street cleaning starts in 10 minutes.
translation.zh:
你得把车开走
街道清扫十分钟后就开始了

translation.en: -[Louis] Hey. -Hey… Louis. [laughs]
translation.zh:
-嘿
-嘿 路易

translation.en: I need a favor.
translation.zh: 我需要你帮个忙

translation.en: I was just about to call you.
translation.zh: 我正要打给你呢

translation.en: I was thinking, for the press statement, something akin to…
translation.zh: 你觉得这样的媒体声明如何

translation.en: "I'm ecstatic to have defrauded the federal government
translation.zh: “我为欺骗联邦政府而感到欣喜若狂

translation.en: and I'm looking forward to doing enough drugs
translation.zh: 并且非常期待继续嗑药

translation.en: to kill Charlie Sheen and his sponsor."
translation.zh: 直到把查理辛和他的赞助商都杀了”

translation.en: -Whatever. -Buddy, I'm joking.
translation.zh:
-随便吧
-伙计 开玩笑的

translation.en: I don't have to tell you that I don't have to tell you that I'm joking.
translation.zh:
不用我说你也懂我在开玩笑
这一点不用我说了吧

translation.en: Look, I want to go on record here
translation.zh: 听着 我想声明一下

translation.en: and let it be known that I know we haven't talked in a bit,
translation.zh: 我知道我们很久没联系了

translation.en: but I'm sorry about the way things ended up with us.
translation.zh: 但咱们那样闹翻了 我很抱歉

translation.en: You were an asshole. I wasn't at my best and…
translation.zh: 你当时很混蛋 我当时状态不好

translation.en: that's why we're good together. Let's do more.
translation.zh:
也正因如此我们才那么合拍
所以咱们继续吧

translation.en: -Trilogy Artistic wants you back. -Louis--
translation.zh:
-艺术三部曲想让你回来
-路易

translation.en: Maybe rehab is a good thing, you know?
translation.zh: 也许去戒瘾中心是件好事

translation.en: It's like a judge-mandated vacation where you come back, lie to the public,
translation.zh: 那就像是法官规定的度假 之后你能回来 对观众撒谎

translation.en: and we go back to fucking them straight in their wallets.
translation.zh: 咱们也能继续掏空他们的腰包

translation.en: Louis,
translation.zh: 路易

translation.en: listen, I need some contact information.
translation.zh: 听着 我需要一个人的联系方式

translation.en: Okay? Someone I used to work with.
translation.zh: 听着 我需要一个人的联系方式 一个曾经和我合作过的人

translation.en: Do you remember my stand-in, Paula…
translation.zh: 你还记得我的替身吗？ 宝拉还是什么的

translation.en: something?
translation.zh: 宝拉还是什么的

translation.en: Look, remind the director
translation.zh: 麻烦你提醒下导演

translation.en: the right one blows at the wrist and the left one blows off at the elbow.
translation.zh: 右手是手腕被轰掉 左手是手肘被轰掉

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: They're ready for you.
translation.zh: 他们准备好见你了

translation.en: Hi, Terry.
translation.zh: 嗨 特里

translation.en: Are there any auditions available today?
translation.zh: 今天有我能参加的试镜吗？

translation.en: Oh, they're auditioning stand-ins now.
translation.zh: 哟 现在连替身都要试镜了呀

translation.en: I got a few inquiries for background stuff.
translation.zh: 是有要招聘几名群演

translation.en: Oh, I don't do extra work.
translation.zh: 哦 我不跑龙套

translation.en: [man] Why? You think you're better than us?
translation.zh: 为啥？觉得自己高我们一等吗？

translation.en: You know, one time, doing a Candy Black vehicle,
translation.zh:
有一次 我们在拍
为坎蒂布莱克量身定制的电影

translation.en: and this one, Little Miss Stand-In, doesn't even join us for lunch.
translation.zh:
而这位替身小姐
连午餐都不愿意和我们一起吃

translation.en: Has no trailer.
translation.zh: 她没自己的拖车

translation.en: Just sits in the corner eating a burrito.
translation.zh: 就自个儿坐在角落吃墨西哥卷饼

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: 真行

translation.en: -[Terry] Uh, Paula? -What is it?
translation.zh:
-宝拉？
-什么事？

translation.en: There's another email here from Louis at Trilogy.
translation.zh: 来自三部曲的路易发了一封电邮

translation.en: They need someone to play Candy Black in a reenactment.
translation.zh:
他们需要一个人在一部翻拍里
饰演坎蒂布莱克

translation.en: They want you to go to the producer's house
translation.zh: 他们指名要你过去制片人家里

translation.en: for an audition.
translation.zh: 进行试镜

translation.en: Right away.
translation.zh: 马上

translation.en: -They want me? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-他们要我？
-对

translation.en: [chuckling] Wow! Oh my God! That's amazing!
translation.zh: 天哪 太棒了

translation.en: Everything's coming up Paula.
translation.zh: 宝拉一切都顺利起来了

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Oh my God!
translation.zh: 我的天哪

translation.en: [Candy] Sorry, I had to lie to get you to come out here.
translation.zh: 抱歉 为了让你过来 我不得不撒谎

translation.en: [Paula] I didn't recognize you at first.
translation.zh: 我差点没认出你来

translation.en: Well, I stopped going to my colorist around the same time I stopped looking in the mirror.
translation.zh:
我不再照镜子的时候
就再也没去找过我的染发师

translation.en: And leaving the house.
translation.zh: 也没踏出房子

translation.en: Come on in.
translation.zh: 进来吧

translation.en: I guess the stand-in work's kind of dried up.
translation.zh: 我想你当替身的活儿也没了吧

translation.en: -Sorry about that. -No problem.
translation.zh:
-真是抱歉
-没事

translation.en: -You want a drink? -Sure.
translation.zh:
-想喝一杯吗？
-好啊

translation.en: So, what are you doing for a living these days?
translation.zh: 那你这些日子都靠什么糊口？

translation.en: Well, actually, I'm working in a nursing home.
translation.zh: 我其实在养老院工作

translation.en: Oh, that must be very rewarding.
translation.zh: 哦 一定成就感满满吧

translation.en: Well, it depends on how you feel about cleaning up human shit.
translation.zh: 那取决于你怎么看待清理大便这件事

translation.en: It's not bad, actually, but they cut my paycheck,
translation.zh: 其实也还不错 但他们减我工资

translation.en: so I fell behind on my rent and my landlord is kind of a hard-ass
translation.zh:
搞得我交不上房租
我的房东是个老顽固

translation.en: and I lost my apartment, so…
translation.zh: 把我赶出了公寓 所以…

translation.en: I'm sort of living in my car.
translation.zh: 我现在基本上就住在车子里

translation.en: Shit, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 靠 我很抱歉

translation.en: No, don't feel bad for me.
translation.zh: 不 别替我感到难过

translation.en: I feel bad for you with that insane verdict.
translation.zh:
我才替你感到惋惜
那判决也太疯狂了

translation.en: I know, I didn't get my tax forms in on time.
translation.zh: 我知道 我没按时提交税表

translation.en: So fucking what?
translation.zh: 那他妈又怎么样？

translation.en: The IRS isn't gonna get a new coffee machine?
translation.zh: 国税局会没钱买新的咖啡机吗？

translation.en: Exactly, and who cares if you have a drink now and again?
translation.zh: 就是啊 而且你偶尔喝上一两杯 谁在乎啊？

translation.en: I don't even party anymore.
translation.zh: 我都不搞派对了

translation.en: It's just, I was so messed up for so long, no one cares.
translation.zh: 只是我堕落了那么久 没人在乎了

translation.en: Well, you shouldn't have to go to rehab.
translation.zh: 但也用不着去戒瘾中心啊

translation.en: [Candy] Oh, I agree.
translation.zh: 我同意

translation.en: But unfortunately, I do.
translation.zh: 但不幸的是 我必须去

translation.en: Unless someone else goes in my place.
translation.zh: 除非有人代替我去

translation.en: How do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思呢？

translation.en: Someone who looks a lot like me.
translation.zh: 一个和我长得很像的人

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: When I said I had you in mind for a part, I wasn't bullshitting.
translation.zh:
当我说我有个角色想让你演时
我不是在扯谎

translation.en: I'm the part and you're the only one auditioning.
translation.zh:
这个角色是我
而你是唯一的试镜者

translation.en: Think of it like a stand-in job for a rehab movie.
translation.zh:
可以把它想成是
为一部戒酒电影当替身

translation.en: Except there's no cameras and no movie.
translation.zh: 只是没摄像机 也根本没电影

translation.en: [Paula laughs] Oh my God!
translation.zh: 我的天哪

translation.en: Well… [clears throat]
translation.zh: 这个嘛

translation.en: I mean, that would be--
translation.zh: 我的意思是 那会是…

translation.en: Could be highly illegal.
translation.zh: 那有可能是严重违法的

translation.en: Technically.
translation.zh: 严格来说

translation.en: [whispers] Do you actually think we could get away with it?
translation.zh: 你真的觉得不会露馅吗？

translation.en: No one's seen my face in years, and I could've had work done.
translation.zh: 已经很多年没人见过我的脸了 说不定我整容了呢

translation.en: Your face is as good as mine.
translation.zh: 咱们的脸根本没差

translation.en: I'd do it myself, but there's someone… [inhales]
translation.zh: 我本想自己去的 但有个人…

translation.en: …there's something… very important that I have to take care of and…
translation.zh: 有件很重要的事我必须去处理

translation.en: I'd offer to pay you money, but I'm kind of broke right now.
translation.zh: 我想付你钱的 但我现在有点穷

translation.en: If I did it, could we go back to the way things were
translation.zh:
如果我去了
我们能够回到以前那样

translation.en: and I could be your stand-in again?
translation.zh: 让我再次给你当替身吗？

translation.en: Hell, no. I'm through with acting.
translation.zh: 绝对不行 我不演戏了

translation.en: Why? You are the best.
translation.zh: 为什么啊？你可是最棒的

translation.en: [scoffs] The best?
translation.zh: 最棒的？

translation.en: At being hit in the face by ladders and watermelons?
translation.zh: 你说被梯子和西瓜砸脸这方面吗？

translation.en: You're the queen of comedy. You're Candy Black.
translation.zh: 你可是喜剧女王 你是坎蒂布莱克

translation.en: [softly] Not anymore.
translation.zh: 现在不是了

translation.en: I don't want to be an actress,
translation.zh: 我根本不想当演员

translation.en: and I sure as fuck don't want to be famous.
translation.zh: 更他妈的不想出名

translation.en: Being famous is like being in the back of a sports car
translation.zh: 出名就像是坐在一辆跑车的后座上

translation.en: driven by a bunch of dicks.
translation.zh: 而开车的是一群混球

translation.en: My whole career was a mistake.
translation.zh: 我整个演艺事业就是个错误

translation.en: I got my first acting job
translation.zh: 我之所以获得第一份演艺工作

translation.en: because I was working as a carpenter on some awful comedy.
translation.zh:
是因为我当时正在
一部烂喜剧的片场上当木匠

translation.en: I was rigging stunt tables, and one day, the lead actress just never showed up.
translation.zh:
每天忙着安装道具桌子
突然有一天 女主角迟迟没出现

translation.en: Turned out she died, an overdose. That should've been a warning.
translation.zh:
原来是吸毒过量死掉了
当初真不该无视这个警告

translation.en: Anyway, they needed someone to get planked
translation.zh: 总之呢 他们需要一个人被木板砸

translation.en: and I said, "Sure, I'll do it."
translation.zh: 然后我就自告奋勇了

translation.en: Anyway, I'm sick of that shit.
translation.zh: 不管怎样 我受够那些破事了

translation.en: Unlike you. You always loved being on a film set.
translation.zh: 不像你 你总是那么爱片场的生活

translation.en: Yes, I did.
translation.zh: 我确实很爱

translation.en: Listen, I'll do it.
translation.zh: 听我说 我去

translation.en: I'll do the rehab thing.
translation.zh: 我代替你去戒瘾中心

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 真的？

translation.en: Amazing.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: But my price is,
translation.zh: 但我的条件是

translation.en: when I get out, you take an acting job,
translation.zh: 等我出来后 你得接一部片

translation.en: and make me your stand-in.
translation.zh: 并让我当你的替身

translation.en: Deal?
translation.zh: 成交吗？

translation.en: [softly] Deal.
translation.zh: 成交

translation.en: -[man 1] Candy! -[woman 1] Candy!
translation.zh:
-坎蒂！
-嘿 坎蒂！

translation.en: [man 2] Candy!
translation.zh: 坎蒂！

translation.en: [woman 2] Come on, Candy, give us a picture!
translation.zh: 来嘛 坎蒂 让我们拍张照

translation.en: [Candy] So, em…
translation.zh: 那个

translation.en: I don't have to go away, after all.
translation.zh: 最后我还是没必要离开

translation.en: I'm so relieved.
translation.zh: 真是松了口气

translation.en: [Steve] That's amazing. I'm happy we still get to talk.
translation.zh: 那太棒了 真高兴我们还能继续通话

translation.en: So, [chuckles]
translation.zh: 那么

translation.en: how's your book coming along?
translation.zh: 你的书写得怎么样了？

translation.en: I've given up trying to write in my apartment.
translation.zh: 我已经放弃尝试在公寓里写作了

translation.en: It's too distracting.
translation.zh: 太让人分心了

translation.en: I found this bar around the corner that doesn't have Wi-Fi,
translation.zh: 我在街角找到一家没无线网的酒吧

translation.en: the one bar in Brooklyn not full of hipsters with laptops.
translation.zh:
也就是全布鲁克林唯一没挤满
带着笔记本装逼的人的酒吧

translation.en: -[Candy] Hmm. -Though I did see one with a typewriter.
translation.zh: 不过倒是看到有个人带打字机了

translation.en: [Candy] I can't wait to read it.
translation.zh: 真迫不及待想拜读

translation.en: I've been reading that Shaker book you recommended.

translation.en: I just love how self-sufficient they were.

translation.en: Like… grow their own food and…

translation.en: made their own… buildings and furniture.

translation.en: It's just to get off the grid and move to a small town.

translation.en: Well,
translation.zh: 那么

translation.en: let's just fucking do it, then.

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-真的

translation.en: Have you heard about Pleasant Hill?

translation.en: It's one of the biggest Shaker settlements.
translation.zh: 那里是震教徒最大的定居点之一

translation.en: We could open up a furniture store and have a cute little apartment above it.

translation.en: Yeah, and they've got some amazing cedar and maple trees up there.

translation.en: I'm looking at my Papa Bear chair right now.
translation.zh: 我正在看着我的趴趴熊椅

translation.en: Our Papa Bear chair.
translation.zh: 我们的趴趴熊椅

translation.en: Thinking about you,
translation.zh: 一边想象着你

translation.en: carving a love seat out of a beautiful piece of cedar.
translation.zh:
用一块美丽的雪松木
雕刻出一座双人椅

translation.en: Your sexy wood talk is giving me wood.
translation.zh: 你这番撩人的木头话把我弄湿了

translation.en: -Oh, really? -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 别逗我了

translation.en: Although we should probably meet face-to-face before we run off together.
translation.zh:
不过我们在私奔之前
应该先出来见个面

translation.en: [woman] Guys, are we ready to start the meeting?

translation.en: Candy,
translation.zh: 坎蒂

translation.en: would you like to kick off the sharing?
translation.zh: 不如从你开始分享吧？

translation.en: Would you mind if I didn't?
translation.zh: 可以不要吗？

translation.en: Perhaps you could tell us about your rock bottom?

translation.en: Well, I haven't really had a rock bottom,
translation.zh: 其实我还没经历过什么低谷

translation.en: so maybe someone else in the group who has should share.
translation.zh:
所以应该让小组里
其他有经历过的人分享一下

translation.en: Candy, it's important to face the facts
translation.zh:
坎蒂 我们的疾病
导致我们犯了些可怕的错误

translation.en: that our disease causes us to make terrible mistakes.
translation.zh:
坎蒂 我们的疾病
导致我们犯了些可怕的错误 你得面对这个事实

translation.en: Like that piece of shit movie you made
translation.zh: 就像你拍的那部烂片一样

translation.en: about the girl who gets super strength when she gets high?
translation.zh:
讲一个吸嗨了
就会有超凡力量的女孩那个

translation.en: Excuse me, it was called Pippi Bongstocking
translation.zh: 不好意思 那部片叫《大麻袜皮皮》

translation.en: and it wasn't shit, it was good.
translation.zh: 而且那不是烂片 那超棒的

translation.en: She got the munchies and she ate a building. It was stupid.
translation.zh:
她吸嗨后嘴馋
吃掉了整栋房子 有够傻逼

translation.en: It was a gingerbread house, fucking hilarious.
translation.zh: 那是个姜饼屋好吗？超搞笑的

translation.en: People, could we bring the focus back to recovery, please?
translation.zh: 大家 能把重点放回戒瘾上吗 拜托？

translation.en: [therapist] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: This must be a real wake-up call for you, a big Hollywood hotshot.
translation.zh:
对你这个好莱坞大明星而言
这肯定是一记警钟吧

translation.en: Yeah, I've never cleaned a table before. It's a real eye-opener.
translation.zh: 是啊 我这辈子没擦过桌子呢 真是大开眼界

translation.en: Yeah. Everybody's freaking out.
translation.zh: 大家都激动死了

translation.en: I was like, "You guys, calm down. She's just, like, a lady."
translation.zh:
我就说：“你们冷静点
她只是个女人”

translation.en: A lady who takes a dump.
translation.zh: 和凡人一样会拉屎的女人

translation.en: Every day.
translation.zh: 天天拉

translation.en: I might have seen maybe one of your early movies,

translation.en: but never any of the sequels

translation.en: and I definitely never read that Vanity Fair profile piece about you.
translation.zh:
而且绝对没看过
你那篇《名利场》杂志的专访

translation.en: Um… I didn't wanna mention this in front of everybody,

translation.en: but I'm Barbara Cox's assistant, the director.

translation.en: Barbara! Yes, of course.

translation.en: She's always been very nice to me.

translation.en: Oh my God, she's the best.
translation.zh: 天啊 她最棒了

translation.en: She's actually paying for me to be here now.
translation.zh: 实际上 是她付钱让我来的

translation.en: Is it because she got sentenced to rehab and you took her place?
translation.zh: 那是因为她被判进戒瘾中心 而你代替她来了吗？

translation.en: What? No, girl. That is crazy.
translation.zh: 啥？不 那太疯狂了

translation.en: I kind of had a breakdown a couple weeks ago.

translation.en: You know what? Here's a tip.

translation.en: Don't mix Fentanyl, Bennies and heroin.
translation.zh: 芬太尼 安非他命和海洛因别混着用

translation.en: -Did anyone ever tell you that? -No.
translation.zh: 有人告诉过你吗？ 没有

translation.en: Look, I know you're not supposed to have contact with the outside,
translation.zh: 听着 我知道我们不该和外界有联系

translation.en: but Barbara messaged me about you.
translation.zh: 但芭芭拉给我发短信并问起了你

translation.en: She wants to know if you're up for doing a cameo in the Saddle Up reboot.
translation.zh:
她想知道你有没有兴趣
在《鞍起来》重拍版里客串演出

translation.en: Really?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Only thing is, is that it films in a couple weeks.
translation.zh: 问题是 几周后就要开拍了

translation.en: -I feel like you're still gonna be here. -[groans] Shit!
translation.zh:
-但我觉得你到时候还会在这里
-该死的

translation.en: Listen, not a big deal.
translation.zh: 听着 不是什么大问题

translation.en: Take it from an old pro in the rehab motherfucking game.
translation.zh: 听我这个戒瘾中心的资深常客说吧

translation.en: If you can convince the ladies with the clipboards
translation.zh: 如果你能说服拿着写字板的女士们

translation.en: that you are serious about your road to recovery,
translation.zh: 你对戒酒这事儿非常认真

translation.en: they'll send you home early.
translation.zh: 那她们会提早放你回家

translation.en: Okay, would you tell Barbara I'm up for it,

translation.en: but I have one condition.
translation.zh: 但我有个条件

translation.en: [Ingrid] Girl, name it!
translation.zh: 尽管说

translation.en: Do you remember my old stand-in?
translation.zh: 你还记得我的旧替身吗？

translation.en: Oh my God, yes. How can I forget her? She's such a fucking loser.
translation.zh: 天啊 当然记得 我怎么可能忘了？ 她是个极品女屌丝

translation.en: [deep sigh] Okay,
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: my name is Candy and I am an alcoholic,
translation.zh: 我是坎蒂 我是个酒鬼

translation.en: and my story is that I love drinking booze.
translation.zh: 我的故事是我很爱喝酒

translation.en: I love drinking booze.
translation.zh: 我超爱喝酒

translation.en: In fact, it's my favorite thing to drink.
translation.zh: 实际上 那是我最爱喝的饮料

translation.en: And, uh, when I've drunk enough booze, I do terrible things like…
translation.zh:
而当我喝多了的时候
我会做出些糟糕的事 例如

translation.en: falling over or…
translation.zh: 摔倒 或者

translation.en: I'll drink more and then say terrible things,

translation.en: like "Get lost," or other things and sometimes I'll pee all over myself,

translation.en: and other people.
translation.zh: 也尿在别人身上

translation.en: And that's who I am.
translation.zh: 这就是我

translation.en: I am a booze-loving,
translation.zh: 我是个爱喝酒

translation.en: foul-mouthed person
translation.zh: 满嘴脏话的人

translation.en: who says and does wrong things and--

translation.en: And pees on themselves and doesn't always clean it up.

还会尿自己身上
有时候也不会擦干净

translation.en: [therapist] Thank you, Candy.

translation.en: I-- I know that was hard for you. Well done.

translation.en: Well done.

translation.en: You've really turned a corner.

translation.en: Who's ready to share next?

translation.en: -[indistinct shouting] -[cameras clicking]

translation.en: That would be amazing.

translation.en: Sure.

translation.en: [Paula] So…

我在戒瘾中心的时候
最不可思议的事情发生了

translation.en: Yeah?

translation.en: The director Barbara Cox asked for you personally,
translation.zh: 芭芭拉考克斯导演亲自点名要你

translation.en: and they need a stand-in.

translation.en: I can't do it.

-什么？
-我没办法拍这部片

-我有约会

-什么？

translation.en: Carpentry Talk.

translation.en: than I ever did as Candy Black, asshole.

translation.en: ever not seen dollar signs and billboards

translation.en: before they actually see me.

总之 我们说要出来见面
已经说了好几个月

translation.en: Well,

告诉他这一年来
我天天都在对他撒谎吗？

translation.en: I can't do that on our first date.

translation.en: It probably would make him happy.

translation.en: It's like buying what you think it's a Ford Focus
translation.zh:
这就好比你以为
自己买了一辆福特福克斯

translation.en: and then finding out it's a Maserati.

我不能因为你想干回老本行
而毁了这段关系

translation.en: I know, I'm sorry.

translation.en: As long as I want.

translation.en: I mean, don't you want Steve to know who you really are?

我是说 你难道不想
让史蒂夫知道你的真实身份吗？

translation.en: Cathy is who I really am.

translation.en: RIP Candy.

translation.en: What's the matter?

translation.en: What does it say?

translation.en: [Candy] "I'm sorry. I wanted to tell you in person,
translation.zh: “很抱歉 我想当面告诉你的

translation.en: but it's simpler this way.
translation.zh: 但这样容易些

translation.en: [sighs] …found out about us.

translation.en: Even though I love you, I love…
translation.zh: 我虽然爱你 但我

translation.en: her more.
translation.zh: 更爱她

translation.en: I know that doesn't make… sense right now.

translation.en: I can't see you or speak to you or message you anymore.
translation.zh:
我无法再见你
或和你通话 或给你发信息了

translation.en: She's…
translation.zh: 她在查看我所有的信息

translation.en: reading all my messages, so please don't try to contact me.
translation.zh: 她在查看我所有的信息 所以请别试图联系我

translation.en: I'm so sorry. It was…
translation.zh: 真的很抱歉

translation.en: [voice cracking] great getting to know you."
translation.zh: 能认识你真好”

translation.en: [Paula] Oh, sweetie, that's terrible. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 那糟透了 真是抱歉

translation.en: At least he bothered to write you
translation.zh: 至少他还费心思

translation.en: something long and eloquent and beautifully written.

translation.en: I knew it was too good to be true.

translation.en: I knew it.

translation.en: What a lying sack of shit.

我就每小时整点给你打电话
直到你出现为止

-祝你约会愉快

你看起来和我一样紧张
所以我想一定是你了

看来我输了 也可以说是赢了

希望你不会对此感到失望

-不
-太好了

translation.en: Thanks. You too.

translation.en: -[giggles] -[Steve] Cathy.

translation.en: This is the real me.

自我们上次交谈后
我的书就没什么进展

说到看书我也是一样

translation.zh:
但我之所以没办法
专注于写我的震教徒书

translation.en: -Me too. -I mean…

我们分享了许多自己的事

-是吗？

translation.en: has offered you a bunch of money just to drink the water on camera.

translation.en: I'm talking low to mid six figures. What do you say?

translation.en: Okay. Will you-- Does-- [clears throat]

translation.en: -[Paula] Hold on a moment. -Sure.
translation.zh:
-稍等一下
-没问题

translation.en: Take all the time you need.

translation.en: but this isn't acting.

translation.en: -This is just you being you. -No.

-这只是让你做自己

translation.en: you have nothing to lose.

translation.en: Well, you can't just stay here and rot. You have to get back out there.

translation.en: And these days, an interview is what you do

translation.en: when you're famous and you've done something wrong.

translation.en: and if you're not gonna get me my old job back,

translation.en: Good.

translation.en: I'm doing this for the cash, to pay you what I owe you.

translation.en: -[Paula] Louis, we're-- -Yes.
translation.zh:
-路易 我们…
-是

translation.en: -I'm in. -Yeah?
translation.zh:
-我接了
-真的？

translation.en: It's great to be back.
translation.zh: 能回去真是太好了

又不是让你给大脑做手术

translation.en: but your recent court case must have been very difficult.
translation.zh:
但这次的诉讼案件
对你来说一定很艰难吧

translation.en: Was it a low point or was it a turning point?

translation.en: You know, in many ways, I think

translation.en: it might have been the best thing that could have happened to me.

translation.en: And I think that going to rehab

translation.en: was a real life-changing experience.

translation.en: I hope you don't mind my asking you, the hat and the glasses.
translation.zh:
希望你不介意我问
你为什么戴着帽子和墨镜

translation.en: It does look like you're trying to hide something.

translation.en: Well, I've had some cosmetic surgery in my…
translation.zh: 那个 我做了整容手术

translation.en: facial area.
translation.zh: 在脸部这里

translation.en: Would you be comfortable taking off the hat and glasses?

translation.en: Well, you look great.
translation.zh: 你看起来很棒

translation.en: That wasn't so bad, was it?

translation.en: If you don't mind, I'd like to bring out someone that you know.

如果你不介意的话
我想请出一个你认识的人

她就是你在片场失控崩溃时

translation.en: -Hi, Savannah. -Hi.

-嗨 萨凡纳
-嗨

translation.en: -Hello. -Hi.
translation.zh:
-你好
-嗨

translation.en: You've only ever communicated with me through your attorney,
translation.zh: 你只通过律师与我联系过

translation.en: so I wanted to talk to you in person.
translation.zh: 所以我想当面和你谈谈

translation.en: Candy, you settled Jenna's suit for an undisclosed amount.

坎蒂 为了与珍娜和解
你付了一笔未公开的金额
是三十万美元

translation.en: Undisclosed until now.
translation.zh: 现在公开了

translation.en: The eye patch, it's medically prescribed.
translation.zh:
-你的眼罩
-是医生让我戴的

translation.en: It's not Pirates of the Caribbean,

translation.en: and it has seriously impacted my castability.

translation.en: Jenna, is there anything you would like to hear from Candy today?

珍娜 你今天来这里
有什么话想亲耳听坎蒂说吗？

translation.en: Yes, I want to hear her say she's sorry.
translation.zh: 有 我想听她说对不起

translation.en: I don't want to hear her say that the payout somehow makes it okay,
translation.zh:
我不想听她说
因为赔偿了所以没关系

translation.en: or that she's got some disease

translation.en: that makes her drink and do terrible things.

translation.en: You're right. I owe you an apology.

translation.en: And I am very sorry for hurting you with that ashtray.

translation.en: And that same thing goes to everyone else I've let down,

translation.en: including my fellow actors and stand-in and my fans

包括我的演员同僚们 我的替身
还有我的粉丝们

translation.en: who believed in me even when I didn't believe in myself.

当我对自己充满怀疑时
你们依然对我有信心

我们眼前这位
是全新的坎蒂布莱克吗？

translation.en: I sure hope so.

translation.en: Buddy, that was fantastic.

translation.en: I love it. I love the smile, the whole face.

translation.en: -Thank you so much. -Don't worry about it.

-非常谢谢你
-不谢

translation.en: Awards ceremonies, a fan convention.

translation.en: I mean, Comic-Con level fun, fun stuff.

translation.en: -Ooh! -People love a redemption story.

translation.en: Your car should be here any minute.

translation.en: Do you mind if, um…

translation.en: If I get a selfie?

translation.en: -Sure. -[Simon] Yeah?

-当然没问题
-真的吗？

translation.en: I would really love to tag you in it, um…

translation.en: but I realize that you're not on social media.

translation.en: Yeah, no.

translation.en: Well, you should definitely consider it, you know? 'Cause…

translation.en: It's a great tool for touching base with your fans,

translation.en: get that personal connection.

translation.en: And if you're too busy,

translation.en: my agency can always post for you. We're a one-stop shop, right?

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-真的吗？
-对

对 你如果上推特
一夜之间就会获得一百万粉丝

translation.en: -Although it's more about Insta now. -People love you.

translation.en: They're waiting for that comeback.

translation.en: They wanna see it on the stories, see it in the snaps.

他们想在社交媒体上
看到你复出的消息

translation.en: You're a star. You are.

translation.en: You know, maybe I should ride with you to make sure you get there okay.

translation.en: Oh, sure.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: It was really nice meeting you.
translation.zh: 能认识你真的很高兴

translation.en: In fact, this whole day has been wonderful.

translation.en: That is so great to hear.

路易警告我
你不太喜欢采访和公关 但你…

translation.en: That's the old me.

translation.en: I hope this isn't inappropriate, but…

translation.en: It would be amazing to keep this going.

translation.en: Maybe over dinner or something.

translation.en: It's an interesting offer. I'd be delighted to entertain it.
translation.zh: 真是有意思的提议 我很乐意接受

translation.en: -Hey, Candy, love the new look. -[Paula] Thank you.
translation.zh:
-坎蒂 我喜欢你的新造型
-谢谢

translation.en: Hey there, Candy.

translation.en: In the future, I'd advise you to check your boundaries.

translation.en: [Steve] This is nuts.

translation.en: Looking forward to making movies?

translation.en: I can't wait.

木匠凯茜得建多少个茶几
才买得起这个地方啊

translation.en: you're the first guy I've dated

translation.en: that hasn't seen dollar signs and billboards before they've seen me.

translation.en: And I know that doesn't excuse what I did and I shouldn't have lied.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: I've been saying sorry all day and it's been working out great.

translation.en: Normally, it's the carpenter who pretends to be a movie star,

translation.en: not the other way around.

translation.en: It's like buying what you think is a Ford Focus,

这就好比你以为
自己买了一辆福特福克斯

translation.en: but finding out it's a Maserati.

translation.en: -I need to check under the hood first. -[chuckles]

translation.en: Sounds good.

translation.en: -Actually, forget it. -[Steve] What? Why?

-还是算了吧
-什么？为什么？

translation.en: I forgot that I'm doing work inside the house,
translation.zh: 我忘了屋里有工程正在进行

translation.en: construction work, so we can't go inside. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 装修工程 所以我们不能进去 抱歉

translation.en: [Steve] Well, let's go to my place.
translation.zh: 那就去我家吧

translation.en: Why don't we-- Why don't you sit on my lap?

translation.en: On my Hans Wegner Papa Bear chair.
translation.zh: 在我的汉斯韦格纳趴趴熊椅上干

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Don't remember?

translation.en: It was one of our first phone sex sessions.
translation.zh: 我们头几次的电话爱爱就是聊这个

translation.en: -Got you all hot and bothered. -Right.
translation.zh:
-把你撩到欲火焚身了呢

translation.en: The phone sex. You know what?

translation.en: I just want to forget about all of that. I want to start over from scratch.
translation.zh: 我只想把那全都忘了 我想从头来过

translation.en: I really found myself warming to her. I like her.
translation.zh: 我开始对她有好感了 我挺喜欢她的

translation.en: You know what? She looks amazing.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？她看起来棒极了

也太好看了吧
那鼻子和烤瓷牙简直是完美

translation.en: That is definitely a Jason Diamond nose, for sure.

translation.en: You know, it's not just physical,

translation.en: there's kind of a glow that's emanating from within.

translation.en: And, I mean, she used to be real nasty.

translation.en: [Candy] Well, it worked.
translation.zh: 成功了呢

translation.en: They like your face.
translation.zh: 她们喜欢你的脸

translation.en: I noticed I've got a Twitter account now.

translation.en: Louis started that. I hope it's okay.
translation.zh: 是路易给你注册的 希望你不介意

translation.en: I couldn't give fucking two shits less.
translation.zh: 我真的完全不在乎

translation.en: Right, I'm gonna transfer 250 grand into your account.
translation.zh:
我现在就把二十五万美元
转入你的账户

translation.en: -[Paula] Thank you. -[Candy] You were right.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 你说得对

translation.en: It's the least I owe you for what you did for me.
translation.zh:
你为我做了那些事
这是我起码该给你的赔偿

translation.en: Well, you're free to go.
translation.zh: 你可以走了

translation.en: Job well done.
translation.zh: 干得好

translation.en: Louis is getting a lot of offers for personal appearances.
translation.zh: 路易最近收到了很多出场邀请

translation.en: He's talking about an apology tour.
translation.zh: 他说要办个巡回道歉

translation.en: [Candy] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: It's a sort of stage show where you go around to different TV stations, apologizing.
